channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Death toll rises to 11 in fire at Bosnian retirement home
item.description: The death toll from a fire at a retirement home in Tuzla in northern Bosnia rose to 11 on Wednesday and about 30 people were injured, police said. The blaze engulfed the seventh floor of the old nine-storey building at around 1945 GMT on Tuesday, sending flames and smoke pouring out of the top flo

item.title: Tanzanian opposition claims security forces are secretly dumping bodies after election violence
item.description: Authorities in Tanzania faced mounting concern Tuesday over killings during crackdowns on protests surrounding last week’s election, with the largest opposition party alleging that security forces were secretly dumping bodies of hundreds killed in the violence. Demonstrations spread across t

item.title: Fire at Bosnia home for the elderly kills at least 10
item.description: At least 10 people died and several were injured in a fire that broke out in a home for the elderly in the town of Tuzla in northern Bosnia late on Tuesday evening, Bosnian media reported. The fire broke out around 9:00 pm (2000 GMT) and was put out around 10:00 pm, Federalna TV reported on its we

item.title: US proposes that the UN authorise a Gaza stabilisation force for 2 years
item.description: The United States has circulated draft text for a UN Security Council resolution that would provide a mandate for an international stabilisation force in Gaza for at least two years, marking the next step in President Donald Trump’s plan to halt two years of war between Israel and Hamas.
